definition.text: The Space Style node can have two different default configurations depending on if it is connected to the Design Space node or the Charting Space node.

paragraphs.text: 1->Foundations->Topic->Design Space Style->Use->All about using the Space Style node with the Design Space.
2->Foundations->Topic->Charting Space Style->Charting Space Style Use->All about using the Space Style node with the Charting Space.
